quotes.quote: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James, American philosopher and psychologist

quotes.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Ghandi

quotes.quote: Don't sit down and wait for the opportunities to come. Get up and make them.
quotes.author: Madam C.J. Walker, American entrepreneur and activist

quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act; the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
quotes.author: Michael Altshuler, American author and motivational speaker

quotes.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.quote: It is often the small steps, not the giant leaps, that bring about the most lasting change.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: In the long run, you make your own luck â€” good, bad, or indifferent.
quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

quotes.quote: If my mind can conceive it, if my heart can believe it, then i can achieve it
quotes.author: muhammad ali

quotes.quote: If my mind can conceive it, if my heart can believe it, then I can achieve it.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali
